name: Greninja
flavorText:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

pokemon.name: Froakie
pokemon.flavorText:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

pokemon.name: Frogadier
pokemon.flavorText:
It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise
control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
